news.title: Fed paper proposes initial margin weights for crypto-linked derivatives
news.titleOriginal: Fed paper proposes initial margin weights for crypto-linked derivatives
news.summary: Traditional risk-weightings and models cannot account for crypto's high volatility or market behavior, according to a Federal Reserve paper.

news.title: TradFi giant Fiserv builds real-time dollar rails for crypto companies
news.titleOriginal: TradFi giant Fiserv builds real-time dollar rails for crypto companies
news.summary: Fiserv launches a 24/7/365 settlement platform for digital asset companies, aiming to reduce banking friction and improve liquidity in the US dollar.
